channel.title: 'Java' Error Help!
channel.description:
Now Ive looked around and I cant find another topic I also did a search and can't find a correct answer to help
' Java' is not recongized as a external or internal command operable program or batch file press and key to continue . . .
:::
I have the 3Paths Set, Classpath path and SET Both updated to 5_07 I have JDK and JRE *LATEST* Firewall is off. I do have a Cache in there
@echo off IF EXIST moparpriv.jar GOTO RUN echo extract the whole moparscape.rar archive because moparpriv.jar is not in this folder and needs to be GOTO END
:RUN java -cp . -Xmx500m -jar moparpriv.jar highmem GOTO END
:END pause
thats in there If i need something else let me know..
Pretty sure.. ><
[b][u]Mopar 2.1[/u][/b] is what im using.

item.title: 'Java' Error Help!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

For Classpath put : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%
For Path put : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin

Thats what should be set for classpath and path. change the 07 to 0x x = your jdk (ex. 06 for jdk 6u6)

Read full topic

item.title: 'Java' Error Help!
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

should be

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

and

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Read full topic

item.title: 'Java' Error Help!
item.dc:creator: @1q1q 1q1q
item.description:
@1q1q wrote:

Now Ive looked around and I cant find another topic I also did a search and can’t find a correct answer to help

’ Java’ is not recongized as a external or internal command
operable program or batch file
press and key to continue . . .

:::

I have the 3Paths Set, Classpath path and SET Both updated to 5_07
I have JDK and JRE LATEST
Firewall is off.
I do have a Cache in there

@echo off
IF EXIST moparpriv.jar GOTO RUN
echo extract the whole moparscape.rar archive because moparpriv.jar is not in this folder and needs to be
GOTO END

:RUN
java -cp . -Xmx500m -jar moparpriv.jar highmem
GOTO END

:END
pause

thats in there If i need something else let me know…

Pretty sure… ><

Mopar 2.1 is what im using.

Read full topic
